- shop shop_midlate_mats	-1, 6607:10000,6755:200000,6608:50000,25740:200,25739:10000,25864:10000,25866:10000,6672:1000
- shop shop_spellbooks	-1,100065:1500000,100066:1500000,100067:1500000,100068:1500000,100069:1500000,100070:1500000,100071:1500000,100072:1500000,100073:1500000,100074:1500000


-	script	cope_gear_shop	FAKE_NPC,{
	switch( select( "- Buy Early-game gears (strong)",
					"- Buy Early-game gears(2) (strong)",
					"- Buy Early-game gears(3) (strong)",
					"- Buy Cash items",
					"- Buy Card Gacha",
					"- Buy Costumes(Garment-body)",
					"- Buy Mid-Late game mats / 중반 재료",
					"- Buy Spellbooks / 주문서"
					))
	{
		case 1: callshop "shop_early_game",1; break;
		case 2: callshop "shop_early_game2",1; break;
		case 3: callshop "shop_early_game3",1; break;
		case 4: callshop "shop_cash_based",1; break;
		case 5: callshop "shop_card_gacha",1; break;
		case 6: callshop "shop_costume",1; break;
		case 7: callshop "shop_midlate_mats",1; break;
		case 8: callshop "shop_spellbooks",1; break;
		default:                              break;
	}
}

prontera,150,174,5	duplicate(cope_gear_shop)	copeRO Shop#go0	24000
//morocc,163,97,5	duplicate(custom_shop)	Tool Dealer#go1	24000
